title: Whereas Council has established municipal standards that prevent encampments on City property except pursuant to a permit; And whereas Council considers it appropriate to maintain such standards but to temporarily amend them to the extent of delegating to the City’s Commissioner, Community Services, the authority to establish a temporary encampment within the land comprising approximately 0.7 acre at the southeast corner of Aylmer and Wolfe Streets subject to conditions to be determined by the said Commissioner; Now therefore be it resolved That Parks and Facilities By-law 19-074 and Trespass By-law 19-075 be amended in the form of amending by-law comprising Appendix A to this motion and that the amending by-law be passed by Council at a special open meeting of Council on Tuesday, September 5, 2023 at 5:50 pm.
